thread.section_title: About.com Business Travel: What's Hot Now
thread.title: What is a Segment?

title: What is a Segment?
text:
Airline Ticket. (Photo by Cassiopeia_sweet) 
Definition: 
There's no end to the number of specialized definitions that surround air travel. But one that many business travelers have probably encountered is segment. 
A segment is basically a portion of an airline itinerary, usually a flight between two cities that's part of a larger or longer travel plan. But if you need more info, it's best to examine air fare rules for specific fares.
